name: Viewergames Arcade
description:
This is a mini-games collection specifically tailored for Twitch Streamers.
As a streamer you fire up one of the games from this game collection and your viewers can immediately join in, take part and full chaos and mayhem will ensue.
Many of Twitch's integration features are supported:
  • A Twitch Extension for convinient controlling and interaction of viewers directely from the channel page
  • Use Channel Points for getting in game items or triggering real-time events
  • Allows use of Twitch Bits to support the streamer and get cosmetic goodies for players to custimze their in-game appearance
